Module entities
Package entities

Class Lesson

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Lesson
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Lab, Lecture, Tutorial
    public abstract class Lesson
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Lesson is an abstract class that can be used to extend to different types of classes in terms of this application. Class Attributes: - lessonType : String, which holds the type of class in the lesson - venue : String, which holds the location where the class is being held - timings : WorkingHours, which holds the time during which the lesson takes place
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • checkValidVenue

        public abstract boolean checkValidVenue​(java.lang.String newVenue)
        Abstract method checkValidVenue() checks if the given venue is valid for the lesson in question. Different children may implement this method differently.
        Parameters:
        newVenue - , which is the venue where the lesson is conducted
        Returns:
        , true if the venue is valid for the lesson, false if the venue is not valid for the lesson.

      • modifyTiming

        public abstract boolean modifyTiming​(WorkingHours newTimings)
        Abstract method modifyTiming is used to modify the time during which a lesson takes place. Different types of lessons may have different timings. Hence different children may implement this method differently.
        Parameters:
        newTimings - , which is the new proposed timing for the lesson.
        Returns:
        true if the timings were successfully modified, false if the timings are invalid.

      • modifyVenue

        public abstract boolean modifyVenue​(java.lang.String newVenue)
        Abstract method modifyVenue() can be used to modify the venue of the lesson. Only certain venues may be applicable to certain lessons, hence children may implement this method differetnly with this restriction in mind.
        Parameters:
        newVenue - , which is the proposed venue for the course.
        Returns:
        true if the venue was valid and successfully modified, false if the venue is invalid.
